ENTITY_GENERAL_7.message: the {locality} branch office of SpaceCruise Inc

EQUIPMENT.message: You are not equipped to handle this mission. {unit} {equipment} required.

FLAVOUR_1_FAILUREMSG.message: Nu pot să cred că abia acum vă întoarceți! Cât timp a fost irosit!

FLAVOUR_1_HOWMUCHTIMETEXT.message: Pentru rambursarea completă a cheltuielilor trebuie să vă întoarceți până pe {due}.

FLAVOUR_1_INTROTEXT.message: Controlul aerian al portului stelar {starport} are nevoie de ajutorul dvs. URGENT pentru a salva o navă de tip {ship} care a aterizat forţat pe {planet}. Condiția sistemelor de susţinere a vieţii e necunoscută. Nava a fost asigurată de către portul stelar {starport} și este acoperită cu suma {cash} privind acţiunile de răspuns în situaţii de urgenţă.

FLAVOUR_1_LOCATIONTEXT.message: Ultima locație cunoscută a navei a fost pe {planet} la coordonatele latitudine/longitudine: {lat} / {long}. ID-ul navei este {shiplabel}.

FLAVOUR_1_SUCCESSMSG.message: Mulțumim, ne-ați luat o piatră de pe inimă! Vă vom trece banii imediat în cont.

FLAVOUR_1_TYPEOFHELPTEXT.message: S-a raportat a fi la bordul navei un echipaj de {crew} și {pass} pasageri. Avem nevoie de cineva să localizeze nava, să salveze orice supraviețuitori și să-i aducă aici cât mai repede.

FLAVOUR_2_ADTEXT.message: NAVĂ RĂMASĂ FĂRĂ COMBUSTIBIL în drum spre {starport}.

FLAVOUR_2_FAILUREMSG.message: Nu-mi vine să cred că m-ați lăsat să aștept atât de mult în mijlocul pustietății! Puteți uita de plată.

FLAVOUR_2_HOWMUCHTIMETEXT.message: Pentru a primi plata integrală sunteți rugat să faceți livrarea până pe {due}.

FLAVOUR_2_INTROTEXT.message: Controlul aerian al portului stelar {starport} a primit de veste că nava așteptată {shiplabel} a rămas fără combustibil și a trebuit să aterizeze de urgență. Pilotul oferă {cash} pentru cine îl poate realimenta.

FLAVOUR_2_LOCATIONTEXT.message: Nava așteaptă la latitudine {lat} / longitudine {long} pe planeta {planet}.

FLAVOUR_2_SUCCESSMSG.message: Mulțumesc foarte mult! Am transferat recompensa în întregime.

FLAVOUR_2_TRANSFERMSG.message: {unit} tonă de combustibil a fost transferată.

FLAVOUR_2_TYPEOFHELPTEXT.message: Pilotul cere o tonă de combustibil din hidrogen.

FLAVOUR_3_ADTEXT.message: MEDICAL EMERGENCY on ship close to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_3_FAILUREMSG.message: Unacceptable performance! We will update our records accordingly.

FLAVOUR_3_HOWMUCHTIMETEXT.message: The substitute pilot will need to reach the ship by {due}.

FLAVOUR_3_INTROTEXT.message: My name is {name} from {starport} air traffic control. I am requesting help in response to a medical emergency involving the pilot of flight {shiplabel} headed for {starport}.

FLAVOUR_3_LOCATIONTEXT.message: The ship had to emergency land at the coordinates: {lat} / {long}.

FLAVOUR_3_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you, commander! Your help has been duly noted.

FLAVOUR_3_TYPEOFHELPTEXT.message: Please transport a substitute pilot from {starport} to the ship so they can fly the ship back to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_4_FAILUREMSG.message: I will send someone else. Don't bother anymore.

FLAVOUR_4_HOWMUCHTIMETEXT.message: For full pay the pilot expects you to deliver the fuel by {due}.

FLAVOUR_4_INTROTEXT.message: {starport} air traffic control has been contacted by the pilot of flight {shiplabel}. They are stranded with an empty fuel tank and have promised to pay {cash} to anyone that will refuel the ship.

FLAVOUR_4_LOCATIONTEXT.message: The ship is stranded on {planet} at coordinates {lat} / {long}.

FLAVOUR_4_SUCCESSMSG.message: Very good. We will recommend you for future assignments.

FLAVOUR_4_TRANSFERMSG.message: {unit} tonă de combustibil a fost transferată.

FLAVOUR_4_TYPEOFHELPTEXT.message: The pilot is asking for 1 ton of hydrogen fuel.

FLAVOUR_5_ADTEXT.message: SHIP OUT OF FUEL close to {starport}.

FLAVOUR_5_FAILUREMSG.message: People are just not dependable anymore.

FLAVOUR_5_INTROTEXT.message: {starport} air traffic control has identified a starship with ID {shiplabel} drifting without fuel close-by. We will pay {cash} to anyone who will refuel the ship so they can vacate {starport} vicinity.

FLAVOUR_5_LOCATIONTEXT.message: The target ship is currently drifting within {dist} km from here. You will have to track down the exact location yourself.

FLAVOUR_5_SUCCESSMSG.message: We will make record of your timely completion of the task.

FLAVOUR_5_TRANSFERMSG.message: {unit} tonă de combustibil a fost transferată.

FLAVOUR_5_TYPEOFHELPTEXT.message: We request the delivery of 1 ton of hydrogen fuel to the ship.

FLAVOUR_6_FAILUREMSG.message: What a desaster! This is the death sentence to our poor colleagues!

FLAVOUR_6_HOWMUCHTIMETEXT.message: You have to be back by {due}.

FLAVOUR_6_INTROTEXT.message: My name is {name} of {entity}. We lost contact with our {ship} {shiplabel} following {problem}. We are willing to pay {cash} for immediate help.

FLAVOUR_6_LOCATIONTEXT.message: Last known position was the vicinity of {planet} in the {system} [{sectorx},{sectory},{sectorz}] system, {dist} ly away from here.

FLAVOUR_6_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you! You can't imagine how relieved we are.

FLAVOUR_6_TYPEOFHELPTEXT.message: I need someone willing to leave immediately and bring our colleagues back to {starport}, should they be alive. The ship had {crew} crew and {pass} passengers on board.

FLAVOUR_7_ADTEXT.message: IMMEDIATE CREW TRANSPORT to the {system} system requested.

FLAVOUR_7_FAILUREMSG.message: Thank you very much, but you are too late!

FLAVOUR_7_HOWMUCHTIMETEXT.message: The replacement crew has to reach the ship by {due}.

FLAVOUR_7_INTROTEXT.message: My name is {name} of {entity}. Our only ship, {ship} {shiplabel}, is drifting with one crew member left on board the ship after {problem}. I am willing to pay {cash} for immediate help.

FLAVOUR_7_LOCATIONTEXT.message: You will find the ship in the {system} [{sectorx},{sectory},{sectorz}] system, {dist} ly from here. It is being kept in orbit around {planet}.

FLAVOUR_7_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you! I have been authorized to transmit the full payment.

FLAVOUR_7_TRANSFERMSG.message: {unit} has transfered to the target ship.

FLAVOUR_7_TYPEOFHELPTEXT.message: We can't return the ship without minimal crew present. I am searching for someone willing to transport a replacement crew of {deliver_crew} to our starship immediately.

FULL_CARGO.message: Ship full. No more room for additional cargo.

FULL_CREW.message: Crew roster full. No more space for more crew.

FULL_PASSENGERS.message: All cabins full. No more space for more passengers.

HOW_FAR.message: How far away is the target?

HOW_MUCH_TIME.message: How much time do I have?

INTERACTION_ABORTED.message: Interaction aborted. Please come closer and try again.

PARTIAL.message: Thank you for your efforts. I hope you will return to complete the task!

PLEASE_LAND.message: Please land ship to allow transfer.

PROBLEM_CREW_1.message: a deadly fight among the crew members

PROBLEM_CREW_2.message: the crew had to chase a deadly {locality} snake found loose on the ship

PROBLEM_CREW_3.message: a {locality} spider killed all the others

PROBLEM_CREW_4.message: what it seems like a {locality} scorpion got into the crew quarters at night

PROBLEM_CREW_5.message: a severe form of {locality} fever killed the others

PROBLEM_CREW_6.message: the other crew members did not return from a space walk

PROBLEM_CREW_7.message: a severe form of food poisoning on the ship

PROBLEM_CREW_8.message: a terrible accident that lead to the ejection of the others into space

PROBLEM_CREW_9.message: a circumstance that I can't comment on publicly

PROBLEM_GENERAL_1.message: a fire in the cargo hold

PROBLEM_GENERAL_10.message: the receipt of a distress call from within {locality}

PROBLEM_GENERAL_2.message: a power failure in the engine core

PROBLEM_GENERAL_4.message: a severe form of food poisoning involving all personnel on board the ship

PROBLEM_GENERAL_7.message: contact with an unidentified flight object

PROBLEM_GENERAL_8.message: a dispute with a competitor's vessel

PROBLEM_GENERAL_9.message: a reboot of the main computer

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_1.message: an unexpected chemical reaction in one of the reaction chambers

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_10.message: a major discovery at {locality} that I am not at liberty to disclose at this time

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_2.message: an infection of a crew member with a pathogen local to {locality}

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_3.message: a leak of experimental pathogens into the main air supply

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_4.message: crew exposure to a specimen collected at {locality}

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_5.message: a chemical explosion in one of the on-board fume hoods

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_6.message: an experimental recreation of {locality} atmospheric gases

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_7.message: a heated dispute between scientists on board the ship

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_8.message: the sudden disappearance of a lead investigator on board the ship

PROBLEM_RESEARCH_9.message: the accidental combination of incompatible specimens from {locality}

RESULT_DELIVERY_COMM.message: Transferred {done} of {todo} tons of {cargotype} to target ship.

RESULT_DELIVERY_CREW.message: Transferred {done} of {todo} crew members to target ship.

RESULT_DELIVERY_PASS.message: Transferred {done} of {todo} passengers to target ship.

RESULT_PICKUP_COMM.message: Picked up {done} of {todo} tons of {cargotype} from target ship.

RESULT_PICKUP_CREW.message: Picked up {done} of {todo} crew members from target ship.

RESULT_PICKUP_PASS.message: Picked up {done} of {todo} passengers from target ship.

THANK_YOU_ACCEPTANCE_TXT.message: Mulțumesc foarte mult. Ajutorul dvs. este foarte apreciat.

TRANSFER_PARTIAL.message: Transfer has been partially completed. Please return to finish transfer.

TYPE_OF_HELP.message: What type of help is needed?

WHERE_IS_THE_TARGET.message: Where do I find the target?
